name: 施陽正
objective: 泰勒多項式，求根法，數值微分與積分，差分式，誤差分析，矩陣分解，微分方程數值解，數值解軟體應用
schedule:
1. Course Outline 
2. Introduction to Matlab, I
3. Introduction to Matlab, II
4. Roots of Equations, I
5. Roots of Equations, II
6. Linear Algebra Equations
7. Gauss Elimination
8. Matrix Inverse
9. Iterative Methods, I
10. Iterative Methods, II
11. Regression Method
12. Numerical Integration
13. Numerical Solutions of O.D.E.s (Initial Value Problem), I
14. Numerical Solutions of O.D.E.s (Initial Value Problem), II
15. Boundary-Value Problems
16. Elliptic Partial Differential Equation
17. Parabolic Partial Differential Equation
18. Final Project
materials:
自編講義

1. Gerald, C.F. and Wheatley, P.O., ”Applied Numerical Analysis”,

   2002.
